#summary Other system information scripts.
=inxi moved to github=

The inxi source repositories  and issue tracker have been moved to github. You can find them at [https://github.com/smxi/inxi github inxi]. The documentation / wiki has been moved to [http://smxi.org/docs/ smxi.org/docs/], which will be its permanent home. The support forums are at [http://techpatterns.com/forums/forum-33.html techpatterns.com/forums/]. IRC support is at irc.oftc.net channel #smxi.
